001package edu.cnm.deepdive.uno.service;
002
003import edu.cnm.deepdive.uno.model.domain.Card;
004import edu.cnm.deepdive.uno.model.domain.Game;
005import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Scheduler;
006import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Single;
007import io.reactivex.rxjava3.schedulers.Schedulers;
008import javax.inject.Inject;
009import javax.inject.Singleton;
010
011/**
012 * Manages the different game operations that can happen in a game of UNO.
013 *
014 * <p>The service class handles creating new games, starting existing games, retrieving game state,
015 * and handling player actions. It uses {@link UnoServiceProxy} and {@link UnoServiceLongProxy} for
016 * communicating with the webserver and {@link GoogleSignInService} for authentication.</p>
017 */
018@Singleton
019public class GameService {
020
021  private final UnoServiceProxy proxy;
022  private final UnoServiceLongProxy longProxy;
023  private final GoogleSignInService signInService;
024  private final Scheduler scheduler;
025
026  /**
027   * Constructs an instance of the GameService using the provided proxies and GoogleSignInService.
028   *
029   * @param proxy         The proxy used to send game operation requests to application's web service.
030   * @param longProxy     The proxy used to send long-polling request to the application's web service for game
031   *                      updates.
032   * @param signInService Google sign-in service used to authenticate users.
033   */
034  @Inject
035  public GameService(UnoServiceProxy proxy, UnoServiceLongProxy longProxy,
036      GoogleSignInService signInService) {
037    this.proxy = proxy;
038    this.longProxy = longProxy;
039    this.signInService = signInService;
040    this.scheduler = Schedulers.single();
041  }
042
043  /**
044   * Creates a new game of UNO with the specified min and max player count.
045   *
046   * @param minPlayerCount int representing the minimum number of players that need to join the UNO
047   *                       game for it to start.
048   * @param maxPlayerCount int representing the maximum number of players that can join the UNO
049   *                       game.
050   * @return An RxJava Single of a Game.
051   */
052  public Single<Game> createGame(int minPlayerCount, int maxPlayerCount) {
053    return Single.fromSupplier(() -> new Game(minPlayerCount, maxPlayerCount))
054        .flatMap((game) -> signInService
055            .refreshToken()
056            .flatMap((token) -> proxy.createGame(game, token)))
057        .subscribeOn(scheduler);
058  }
059
060  /**
061   * Starts an existing game of UNO.
062   *
063   * @param game The game to be started.
064   * @return An RxJava Single of the Game which is started.
065   */
066  public Single<Game> startGame(Game game) {
067    return Single.fromSupplier(() -> game.getId())
068        .flatMap((gameId) -> signInService
069            .refreshToken()
070            .flatMap((token) -> proxy.startGame(gameId, token)))
071        .subscribeOn(scheduler);
072  }
073
074  /**
075   * Submits a player's move in a Game of UNO.
076   *
077   * @param game The game which the move is being submitted to.
078   * @param card The card which is being submitted as a player's move.
079   * @return An RxJava Single of the Game which is getting a move submitted to.
080   */
081  public Single<Game> submitMove(Game game, Card card) {
082    return Single.fromSupplier(() -> card)
083        .flatMap((c) -> signInService
084            .refreshToken()
085            .flatMap((token) -> proxy.submitMove(game.getId(), token, c)))
086        .subscribeOn(scheduler);
087  }
088
089  /**
090   * Draws a card for a user.
091   *
092   * @param game The game which the user is drawing a card for.
093   * @return An RxJava Single of the Game which gets updated after the user's draw.
094   */
095  public Single<Game> drawCard(Game game) {
096    return Single.fromSupplier(() -> game)
097        .flatMap((g) -> signInService
098            .refreshToken()
099            .flatMap((token) -> proxy.drawCard(game.getId(), token)))
100        .subscribeOn(scheduler);
101  }
102
103  /**
104   * Retrieves the current state of the specified game.
105   *
106   * @param game The game to retrieve.
107   * @return An RxJava Single of the Game which was retrieved.
108   */
109  public Single<Game> getGame(Game game) {
110    return signInService.refreshToken()
111        .flatMap((token) -> longProxy.getGame(game.getId(), token))
112        .subscribeOn(scheduler);
113  }
114
115}
